column5: I may be wrong, but I'm pretty sure I saw a picture of Steve Rowbotham in this months issue of Ontario Out of Doors.  Anybody else see him there....was that you Steve?  Cheers  Craig
Are you talking about the OFAH ad? your right that is Steve... but not the Steve you are thinking of..  G
Ya....was the OFAH ad that I was talking about G.   Cheers  Craig
